title: SOLD - T206 Pfeister seated back run - Starter Lot
author: mantleman

posts.post_title: SOLD - T206 Pfeister seated back run - Starter Lot
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,

Giving up almost as fast as I started !!!

Looking to sell this as a lot.  All four cards for $80 dlvd.

Cards included are:

SOVEREIGN 
POLAR BEAR 
PIEDMONT 350
SWEET CAPORAL 350/30

PS - If it's still available, Frank has a nice CYCLE back for a great price too !

Payment via Paypal with $80 net to me via [url]andysargent1@hotmail.com[/url]

Willing to entertain reasonable offers.  Looking to fund another purchase.

Andy

Any takers at $90 dlvd??

Email me at [url]andysargent1@hotmail.com[/url]
Looking for $80 dlvd for these four cards.  A great way to start a back run!!!
